content.title: Pleasant Hill Lanes - Family Bowling Since 1962
content.meta_description: Family owned and operated bowling center in Pleasant Hill. Birthday parties, corporate events, leagues, and open bowling since 1962.
content.hero_subtitle: Family Owned and Operated Bowling Center since 1962
content.open_bowling_desc: Bowling is fun for the whole family. Everyone can bowl, nobody has to sit on the side line.
content.specials_desc: EXPERIENCE A WALLET-FRIENDLY WAY TO ROLL. LEARN MORE ABOUT OUR AMAZING SPECIALS!
content.leagues_desc: Join our competitive leagues for bowlers of all skill levels. Fun and prizes await!
content.book_event_desc: Pleasant Hill Lanes is your premier facility for corporate outings, team building, youth events, fundraising and much more! Our team of event planners are ready to help you organize and book your next event!

carousel_items.title: Bowl Your Way Through the Heat: Why Bowling Should Be Your New Favorite Summer Activity
carousel_items.description: Summer is the time for outdoors, barbecues, pool parties, and beaches! But if you are not into the heat and want a cool way to have fun this summer, bowling is your answer.

carousel_items.title: Corporate Team Building Events
carousel_items.description: Build stronger teams with our corporate bowling packages. Perfect for company outings and employee appreciation events.

carousel_items.title: Birthday Party Packages
carousel_items.description: Make your next birthday celebration unforgettable with our complete party packages including food, decorations, and dedicated party host.

content.footer_text: Pleasant Hill Lanes is a family-owned and operated bowling center. Opened in 1962 by Robert Maclary, who envisioned bringing wholesome family entertainment to Wilmington, DE.
